fmiModelDescription.description: 1st part of the system model, consisting of the room with heat transfer

ScalarVariable.name: vol.hOut_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Internal connector for leaving temperature of the component

ScalarVariable.name: der(vol.hOut_internal)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Internal connector for leaving temperature of the component)

ScalarVariable.name: der(vol.dynBal.mXi[1])
ScalarVariable.description: Masses of independent components in the fluid

ScalarVariable.name: heaCap.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: preHea.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: theCon.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate from port_a -> port_b

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.Hb_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Enthalpy flow across boundaries or energy source/sink

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.mWat_flow_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to connect to conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.mXi[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Masses of independent components in the fluid

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.medium.MM
ScalarVariable.description: Molar mass (of mixture or single fluid)

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.medium.dT
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature difference used to compute enthalpy

ScalarVariable.name: vol.heatPort.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: QRooInt_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Internal heat gains of the room

ScalarVariable.name: booleanToReal1.realFalse
ScalarVariable.description: Output signal for false Boolean input

ScalarVariable.name: booleanToReal1.realTrue
ScalarVariable.description: Output signal for true Boolean input

ScalarVariable.name: preHea.alpha
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature coefficient of heat flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: sampleTrigger1.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Time instant of first sample trigger

ScalarVariable.name: sampleTrigger2.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Time instant of first sample trigger

ScalarVariable.name: set_hysteresis_intervallum_tester1.sampleTrigger1.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Time instant of first sample trigger

ScalarVariable.name: step1.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Output y = offset for time < startTime

ScalarVariable.name: vol.X_start[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Start value of mass fractions m_i/m

ScalarVariable.name: vol.X_start[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Start value of mass fractions m_i/m

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.CSen
ScalarVariable.description: Aditional heat capacity for implementing mFactor

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.X_start[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Start value of mass fractions m_i/m

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.X_start[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Start value of mass fractions m_i/m

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.cp_default
ScalarVariable.description: Heat capacity, to compute additional dry mass

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.mSenFac
ScalarVariable.description: Factor for scaling the sensible thermal mass of the volume

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.rho_default
ScalarVariable.description: Density, used to compute fluid mass

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.rho_start
ScalarVariable.description: Density, used to compute fluid mass

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.s[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Vector with zero everywhere except where species is

ScalarVariable.name: vol.mSenFac
ScalarVariable.description: Factor for scaling the sensible thermal mass of the volume

ScalarVariable.name: vol.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Small mass flow rate for regularization of zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: vol.rho_default
ScalarVariable.description: Density, used to compute fluid mass

ScalarVariable.name: vol.rho_start
ScalarVariable.description: Density, used to compute start and guess values

ScalarVariable.name: TOut.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: theCon.port_a.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: theCon.port_b.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: vol.XiOut_internal[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Internal connector for leaving species concentration of the component

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Sensible plus latent heat flow rate transferred into the medium

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.XiOut[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Leaving species concentration of the component

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.hOut
ScalarVariable.description: Leaving specific enthalpy of the component

ScalarVariable.name: vol.heaFloSen.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow from port_a to port_b as output signal

ScalarVariable.name: vol.heaFloSen.port_a.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: vol.heaFloSen.port_b.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: vol.preTem.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.energyDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of energy balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.massDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of mass balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.substanceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of independent mass fraction balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.traceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of trace substance balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: vol.energyDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of energy balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: vol.massDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of mass balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: vol.substanceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of independent mass fraction balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: vol.traceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Type of trace substance balance: dynamic (3 initialization options) or steady state

ScalarVariable.name: rSFlipFlop.Qini
ScalarVariable.description: Start value of Q at initial time

ScalarVariable.name: rSFlipFlop.pre.pre_u_start
ScalarVariable.description: Start value of pre(u) at initial time

ScalarVariable.name: vol.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = false to simplify equations, assuming, but not enforcing, no flow reversal. Used only if model has two ports.

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.medium.preferredMediumStates
ScalarVariable.description: = true if StateSelect.prefer shall be used for the independent property variables of the medium

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.medium.standardOrderComponents
ScalarVariable.description: If true, and reducedX = true, the last element of X will be computed from the other ones

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.use_C_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Set to true to enable input connector for trace substance

ScalarVariable.name: vol.dynBal.use_mWat_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Set to true to enable input connector for moisture mass flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: vol.useSteadyStateTwoPort
ScalarVariable.description: Flag, true if the model has two ports only and uses a steady state balance

ScalarVariable.name: vol.use_C_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Set to true to enable input connector for trace substance

ScalarVariable.name: rSFlipFlop.nor.u1
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of first Boolean input signal

ScalarVariable.name: rSFlipFlop.nor.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of second Boolean input signal

ScalarVariable.name: rSFlipFlop.nor1.u1
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of first Boolean input signal

ScalarVariable.name: rSFlipFlop.nor1.u2
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of second Boolean input signal
